text: Luxembourg () is a canton in Luxembourg. Its capital is Luxembourg. It is the only canton, other than Mersch, to be entirely surrounded by other cantons, and therefore not to have an international boundary. ==Geography== With an area of , and a population (2017) of 179,369, the Luxembourg canton has a population density of inhabitants/km². It is bordered on the north by the Mersch and Grevenmacher cantons, on the southeast by the Remich canton, on the southwest by the Esch-sur-Alzette canton, and on the west by the Capellen canton. ==Communes== The Luxembourg canton has 11 communes (2017 population)ː #Bertrange (7,999) #Contern (3,736) #Hesperange (15,049) #Luxembourg (114,303) #Niederanven (6,090) #Sandweiler (3,592) #Schuttrange (4,028) #Steinsel (5,311) #Strassen (8,828) #Walferdange (8,046) #Weiler-la-Tour (2,387) ==Gallery== File:Hesperange 02.jpg|The center of Hesperange with the castle and the church File:Sirbeischetter.JPG|Syre river near Schuttrange, Luxembourg File:Aarnescht01.jpg|Niederanven, Luxembourg: Part of the nature reserve "Aarnescht" File:Kulturhaus Niederanven.jpg|Culture house of Niederanven, Luxembourg ==Related pages== * Cantons of Luxembourg * Former Districts of Luxembourg * List of cities in Luxembourg ==References==
